name: Modifire
description:
The main mechanic of this game is that one attribute of the player gets made "Less" while another attribute of the player gets made "More". I styled this game after 2015 era Flash Games(R.I.P). So in that vein, here are the controls after a long-winded description: WASD - move, Left CTRL - Sprint, R - reload, 1, 2, 3 or scroll wheel - select gun. 

Edit: I did all of the art for this game except for the guns.
